title: WTTF: T215 low grade (have S74 Silk Cobb to trade)

posts.post_title: WTTF: T215 low grade (have S74 Silk Cobb to trade)
posts.post_content:
Looking to trade for low grade T215 (either type).

Have this S74 Cobb for trade.

Email preferred.

Cheers,
Steve

(PS - Would also be interested in nicer T215s...obviously this Cobb wouldn't get me there, but I would buy or trade other things...)
